thread.title: David
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by David

author: David
title: David
text: Always pleased with the frame kits I purchase from American frame. Assuming I can measure my artwork correctly, everything else is a breeze. Many, many framing options, but all have worked perfectly for me. My only "complaint' concerns the packaging; those old-fashioned copper staples sure do secure the package but are a bear to remove. Wish they'd consider another option. When other vendors are doing everything they can to minimize the packaging--and its associated cost--American Frame does everything possible to ensure that their orders arrive safely. Good for them!
